org.youscope.common.job

Class EditableJobContainerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • org.youscope.common.job.JobAdapter
            • org.youscope.common.job.EditableJobContainerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, Component, EditableJobContainer, Job, JobContainer

    public abstract class EditableJobContainerAdapter
extends JobAdapter
implements EditableJobContainer
    /** Convenient adapter class to implement a job which contains other jobs. Similar to JobAdapter, except that additional functionality to add and remove sub-jobs is already implemented, as well as the initialization and uninitialization of these sub-jobs. The sub-jobs can be accessed (e.g. the function Job.executeJob(ExecutionInformation, Microscope, MeasurementContext)) via getJobs().
    Author:
    Moritz Lang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • insertJob

        public void insertJob(Job job,
                      int jobIndex)
               throws MeasurementRunningException,
                      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Description copied from interface: EditableJobContainer
        Inserts a job at the given index. The index of the job previously having the index, and all jobs having higher indices, are increased.
        Specified by:
        insertJob in interface EditableJobContainer
        Parameters:
        job - The job to be inserted.
        jobIndex - Index where the job should be inserted.
        Throws:
        MeasurementRunningException - Thrown if job could not be added, e.g. because measurement is already running.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - Thrown if index is smaller than zero, or greater or equal JobContainer.getNumJobs().
